mapper.insert: INSERT INTO hospital ( HOS_NUM, DUTYADDR, DUTYDIV, DUTYDIVNAME, DUTYEMCLS, DUTYEMCLSNAME, DUTYERYN, DUTYETC, DUTYMAPIMG, DUTYNAME, DUTYTEL1, DUTYTEL3, DUTYTIME1C, DUTYTIME2C, DUTYTIME3C, DUTYTIME4C, DUTYTIME5C, DUTYTIME6C, DUTYTIME7C, DUTYTIME8C, DUTYTIME1S, DUTYTIME2S, DUTYTIME3S, DUTYTIME4S, DUTYTIME5S, DUTYTIME6S, DUTYTIME7S, DUTYTIME8S, HPID, POSTCDN1, POSTCDN2, DUTYINF, LON, LAT, X, Y, DUTYWEEKENDAT ) VALUES ( #{HOS_NUM}, #{DUTYADDR}, #{DUTYDIV}, #{DUTYDIVNAME}, #{DUTYEMCLS}, #{DUTYEMCLSNAME}, #{DUTYERYN}, #{DUTYETC}, #{DUTYMAPIMG}, #{DUTYNAME}, #{DUTYTEL1}, #{DUTYTEL3}, #{DUTYTIMEC}, #{DUTYTIME2C}, #{DUTYTIME3C}, #{DUTYTIME4C}, #{DUTYTIME5C}, #{DUTYTIME6C}, #{DUTYTIME7C}, #{DUTYTIME8C}, #{DUTYTIME1S}, #{DUTYTIME2S}, #{DUTYTIME3S}, #{DUTYTIME4S}, #{DUTYTIME5S}, #{DUTYTIME6S}, #{DUTYTIME7S}, #{DUTYTIME8S}, #{HPID}, #{POSTCDN1}, #{POSTCDN2}, #{DUTYINF}, #{LON}, #{LAT}, #{X}, #{Y}, #{DUTYWEEKENDAT} )
